Class CommentLoader

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Loader<D>
      android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<java.util.ArrayList<Comment>>
          ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.loaders.CommentLoader

public class CommentLoader
extends android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<java.util.ArrayList<Comment>>

Responsible for asynchronously loading Comments from the ElasticSearch server for delivery to an adapter.
